sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ThemeService, ThemeConfig } from '../../services/theme.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { theme: ThemeConfig; constructor( private router: Router, private themeService: ThemeService ) { this.theme = { primaryColor: '#4a6bff', primaryLight: '#e8edff', secondaryColor: '#34d399', companyName: 'LeadLift' }; } ngOnInit(): void { this.themeService.theme$.subscribe(theme => { this.theme = theme; }); } navigateToAddLead(): void { this.router.navigate(['/add-lead']); } navigateToDashboard(): void { this.router.navigate(['/dashboard']); } }

Welcome to {{ theme.companyName || 'LeadLift' }}

AI-Powered Lead Generation and Qualification

Capture, qualify, and manage leads with the power of artificial intelligence. LeadLift helps you identify the most promising leads for your business.

Key Features

person_add

Lead Capture

Easily capture leads through our intuitive form or API integration.

psychology

AI Qualification

Automatically qualify leads using advanced AI algorithms.

storage

Data Storage

Securely store and manage all your leads in CSV format.

dashboard

Analytics Dashboard

Get insights into your lead quality and conversion metrics.

How It Works

1

Capture

Collect lead information through our form or API.

2

Qualify

AI analyzes and scores leads based on multiple factors.

3

Store

Leads are automatically stored in CSV format.

4

Analyze

Review lead quality and insights on your dashboard.

Ready to Start Qualifying Leads?

Begin capturing and qualifying leads with the power of AI.
